comment: How is the hop flavor/presence with 1/2 oz of citra?

oofda, I should update that! 
the answer to your question would be none at all. 
when I brewed this last fall, I did 1 full oz of citra, .5 @ 10 and .5 @ 5. 
presence gives a nice citrus character that the apple really does build on. Rounds out the flavor for me, So it doesnt just taste like unsweetened "juice".
